mapper.select: select mo.market_no, to_char(mo.market_order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') order_date, mod.*, m.market_name marketName, f.food_name foodName from market_order_detail mod join market_order mo on mod.market_order_no = mo.market_order_no join market m on mo.market_no = m.market_no join food f on mod.food_no = f.food_no where market_order_flag = 0 and market_order_enabled=1 and market_order_detail_enabled = 1
mapper.update: update stock set stock_amount = stock_amount + #{amount} where market_no = #{marketNo} and food_no = #{food}
update market_order set market_order_flag = 1 where market_order_no = #{orderNo}
